basicSkills.title: Art (Grouped)
basicSkills.description: Create works of Art in your chosen medium.

basicSkills.title: Athletics
basicSkills.description: Impacts on your movement abilities in combat.

basicSkills.title: Bribery
basicSkills.description: Will tell you if a target may be bribed and allow you to guess a target number.

basicSkills.title: Gamble
basicSkills.description: Measure the likelihood of a bet paying off.

basicSkills.title: Intuition
basicSkills.description: Suss if something is wrong or give you an advantage in combat.

basicSkills.title: Leadership
basicSkills.description: Issue orders or bolster psychology tests.

basicSkills.title: Row
basicSkills.description: How effective at rowing in dangerous situations.

advancedSkills.title: Animal Care
advancedSkills.description: Tend animals if they become sick or wounded.

advancedSkills.title: Channelling (Grouped)
advancedSkills.description: Ability to control the winds of magic.

advancedSkills.title: Language (Grouped)
advancedSkills.description: Speak the tongue. Language(Magick) is used to cast spells.

advancedSkills.title: Lore (Grouped)
advancedSkills.description: formally taught in that area, allowing you to recall facts.

advancedSkills.title: Pray
advancedSkills.description: Used to pray to a deity with blessings.

advancedSkills.title: Research
advancedSkills.description: Pulling information from libraries, scrolls, etc.

advancedSkills.title: Secret Signs (Grouped)
advancedSkills.description: How to use special markings or signs in a group.

advancedSkills.title: Swim
advancedSkills.description: How well you can swim without drowning.

advancedSkills.title: Track
advancedSkills.description: Ability to follow trails and signs left by others.

talents.title: Criminal
talents.description:
Take extra money as income. Because of your obvious criminal nature, others consider you lower Status than them unless they also have the Criminal Talent, where Status is compared as normal — perhaps you have gang tattoos, look shifty, or are just rough around the edges, it’s your choice. Because of this, local law enforcers are always suspicious of you and suspect your motivations, which only gets worse the more times you have this Talent, with the exact implications determined by the GM. Lawbreakers without the Criminal Talent earn significantly less coin but are not obviously the sort to be breaking the law, so maintain their Status. With GM consent, you may spend XP to remove levels of the Criminal Talent for the same XP it cost to buy.
Max selections: 0
